  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/jamckier" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">John McKiernan</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/jamckier">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">jamckier</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Father, husband with a wide variety of interests. Labour Party and community Campaigner</p>

As our public services are being slashed, the Tories are letting an elite few get away with not paying their fair share.

We're not broke, we're being robbed.</p>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="979274239772684288" id="stream-item-tweet-979274239772684288" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;979274239772684288&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="977580372283265024" data-item-id="977580372283265024" data-permalink-path="/jamckier/status/977580372283265024" data-conversation-id="977580372283265024" data-tweet-nonce="977580372283265024-845a61b4-5e65-4448-90ff-a104300736d7" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="jamckier" data-name="John McKiernan" data-user-id="562913471" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="RuthSmeeth" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;562913471&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamckier&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;20428671&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;RuthSmeeth&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Ruth Smeeth MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Ruth Smeeth MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Ruth Smeeth MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">John Prescott Retweeted Gavin Williamson MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Here's a thought. Go to your next Cabinet meeting and ask your Chancellor and PM to stop cutting council budgets and bloody well give them more money. <a href="/hashtag/happytohelp?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>happytohelp</b></a><a href="https://t.co/rsXpkhDvhC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/gavinwilliamson/status/971430148565356544" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/gavinwilliamson/status/971430148565356544"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/gavinwilliamso</span><span class="invisible">n/status/971430148565356544</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">John Prescott added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/GavinWilliamson/status/971430148565356544" data-conversation-id="971430148565356544" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="971430148565356544" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="GavinWilliamson" data-user-id="368314502" href="/GavinWilliamson/status/971430148565356544" data-conversation-id="971430148565356544" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Gavin Williamson MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>GavinWilliamson</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Concerned that Staffordshire County Council will no longer be supporting a number of bus services in <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SouthStaffordshire</b></span>. I have created a petition in response to this which I encourage you to sign.

  </div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">John McKiernan Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Rough sleeping in Burton is increasing, even in Lytham St Anne's people are sleeping rough and on the streets.<a href="https://t.co/Zc8qyLSod1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/941656610019082240" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/941656610019082240"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/941656610019082240</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">John McKiernan added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/jeremycorbyn/status/941656610019082240" data-conversation-id="941656610019082240" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>

Under Labours plans to introduce a Real Living Wage workers will be better off by 3,000.<a href="https://t.co/ZesxFDgHAH" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ZesxFDgHAH</a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1.9K</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jamckier" data-user-id="562913471">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">John McKiernan Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The pressure on absent Tories is building<a href="https://t.co/gP1sn5wZZM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/922515876687073282" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/922515876687073282"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/922515876687073282</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">John McKiernan added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/jeremycorbyn/status/922515876687073282" data-conversation-id="922515876687073282" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="922515876687073282" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="jeremycorbyn" data-user-id="117777690" href="/jeremycorbyn/status/922515876687073282" data-conversation-id="922515876687073282" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On the eve of <a href="/hashtag/WMHD17?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WMHD17</b></a> 160 <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> MPs have written to the PM to ask that mental health funding is ring-fenced. Now is the time for action.<a href="https://t.co/R8IHd50Dm2" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/R8IHd50Dm2</a><span class="tweet-poi-geo-text">  At <a href="/search?q=place%3A0952a20cefd62001" class="js-nav u-textUserColorHover js-geo-pivot-link" data-nav="search" data-place-id="0952a20cefd62001">House Of Commons</a></span></p>

                <a class="pretty-link js-user-profile-link" href="/jamckier" data-user-id="562913471" rel="noopener"><b>John McKiernan</b></a> Retweeted

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is most powerful speech I've heard for a long time <a href="/hashtag/ForTheMany?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ForTheMany</b></a><a href="https://t.co/4gOAazcONk" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/877979528282243073" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/877979528282243073"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/877979528282243073</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="871419664366284800" data-item-id="871419664366284800" data-permalink-path="/jamckier/status/871419664366284800" data-conversation-id="871419664366284800" data-tweet-nonce="871419664366284800-e29363dc-be84-40a8-a257-16a434eeaafb" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="jamckier" data-name="John McKiernan" data-user-id="562913471" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="AndrewGriffiths" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;562913471&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamckier&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;222477026&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AndrewGriffiths&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Andrew Griffiths&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Andrew Griffiths&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Andrew Griffiths&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The problems are piling up for Theresa May, says <a href="/JonAshworth" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="143212610"><s>@</s><b>JonAshworth</b></a>. Agree? RT

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--favorite u-hiddenVisually">

  </div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Veterans who suffer <a href="/hashtag/mentalhealth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mentalhealth</b></a> problems deserve excellent treatment.   <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Take the survey: A Referendum on the European Union, start to have your say. <a href="http://t.co/0Q3oFsUOU7" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.sion-simon.com/europeanref?recruiter_id=59939" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.sion-simon.com/europeanref?recruiter_id=59939"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">sion-simon.com/europeanref?re</span><span class="invisible">cruiter_id=59939</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Cameron gets applause for saying that 70 Labour MPs use zero hours contracts. But ITS NOT TRUE <a href="/hashtag/leadersdebate?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>leadersdebate</b></a><a href="http://t.co/yLpIwOcSpB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/L8v7g" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/L8v7g"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/L8v7g</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"Must read" by john mckiernan. <a href="/hashtag/poetweet?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>poetweet</b></a> <a href="http://t.co/u9j2MOeFbU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://poetweet.com.br/?p=0IzN5gDN&amp;lang" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://poetweet.com.br/?p=0IzN5gDN&amp;lang"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">poetweet.com.br/?p=0IzN5gDN&amp;la</span><span class="invisible">ng</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> Made me smile, thanks @EEjMcKiernan</p>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The <a href="/BurtonMailNews" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="45806598"><s>@</s><b>BurtonMailNews</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/feedourfamilies?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>feedourfamilies</b></a> campaign will run until Tuesday, so there's still time to donate if you haven't - or to do it again!</p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-544567149222969344">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="2">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForAria" id="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-538309013046587392" data-aria-label-part="">2 likes</span>
      </span>
    </span>
  </div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">
    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">40</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/LeonC1963" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="244149327"><s>@</s><b>leonc1963</b></a> The deficit is going down.But the amount of money being borrowed to make that happen is stupendous. Never read that in the papers</p>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

  </button>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="450957936626765824" data-item-id="450957936626765824" data-permalink-path="/WomenForIndy/status/450957936626765824" data-conversation-id="450957936626765824" data-tweet-nonce="450957936626765824-8139bbcb-8ff9-41f9-89e3-89bea39dfd1c" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="451005685007138816" data-retweeter="jamckier" data-screen-name="WomenForIndy" data-name="WomenForIndependence" data-user-id="564842119" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;564842119&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;WomenForIndy&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;WomenForIndependence&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;WomenForIndependence&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;WomenForIndependence&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;562913471&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamckier&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jamckier" data-user-id="562913471">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionReply" data-modal="ProfileTweet-reply" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-reply-count-aria-438318582674784256">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

</small>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="424635719613964288" data-item-id="424635719613964288" data-permalink-path="/jamckier/status/424635719613964288" data-conversation-id="424635719613964288" data-tweet-nonce="424635719613964288-844a87ec-c3fb-473a-8f84-aab014fc301a" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="jamckier" data-name="John McKiernan" data-user-id="562913471" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;562913471&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamckier&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

    </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>

  </span>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jamckier" data-user-id="562913471">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Winter Campaign launch tomorrow. Meeting outside Burton Town Hall at 11am.   </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="370575849688666113" data-item-id="370575849688666113" data-permalink-path="/newscientist/status/370575849688666113" data-conversation-id="370575849688666113" data-tweet-nonce="370575849688666113-8247b7eb-dabb-4944-a1f1-892f74bbce54" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="370861862445142016" data-retweeter="jamckier" data-screen-name="newscientist" data-name="New Scientist" data-user-id="19658826" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;19658826&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;newscientist&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;New Scientist&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;New Scientist&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;New Scientist&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;562913471&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamckier&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

      </li>
  </ul>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Please retweet <a href="http://t.co/pt5YghnAL1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.artandsoulfriendshipgroup.com" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.artandsoulfriendshipgroup.com"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">artandsoulfriendshipgroup.com</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> mental health support charity desperate need funds to stop closure donate #@asfgcharity thankyou</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="358341685626933248" data-item-id="358341685626933248" data-permalink-path="/jamckier/status/358341685626933248" data-conversation-id="358341685626933248" data-tweet-nonce="358341685626933248-19f1920f-35f5-4eef-9b41-1a9f0b81f12c" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="jamckier" data-name="John McKiernan" data-user-id="562913471" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;562913471&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;jamckier&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;John McKiernan&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="context">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jamckier" data-user-id="562913471">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/932557415907840000/29o8CfQb_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>
